001package ca.gc.cra.radar.config;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.pipeline.AssembleUseCase;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.pipeline.LiveProcessingUseCase;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.pipeline.SegmentCaptureUseCase;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.ClockPort;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.MessageReconstructor;
008import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.MetricsPort;
009import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.PairingEngine;
010import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.PacketSource;
011import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.PersistencePort;
012import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.ProtocolDetector;
013import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.ProtocolModule;
014import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.SegmentPersistencePort;
015import ca.gc.cra.radar.adapter.kafka.HttpKafkaPersistenceAdapter;
016import ca.gc.cra.radar.adapter.kafka.KafkaSegmentReader;
017import ca.gc.cra.radar.adapter.kafka.KafkaSegmentRecordReaderAdapter;
018import ca.gc.cra.radar.adapter.kafka.SegmentKafkaSinkAdapter;
019import ca.gc.cra.radar.adapter.kafka.Tn3270KafkaPersistenceAdapter;
020import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
021import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.capture.PcapPacketSource;
022import ca.gc.cra.radar.capture.pcap.PcapFilePacketSource;
023import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.detect.DefaultProtocolDetector;
024import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.metrics.NoOpMetricsAdapter;
025import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.net.FrameDecoderLibpcap;
026import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.net.ReorderingFlowAssembler;
027import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.persistence.NoOpPersistenceAdapter;
028import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.persistence.http.HttpSegmentSinkPersistenceAdapter;
029import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.persistence.segment.SegmentFileSinkAdapter;
030import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.persistence.tn3270.Tn3270SegmentSinkPersistenceAdapter;
031import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.protocol.http.HttpMessageReconstructor;
032import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.protocol.http.HttpPairingEngineAdapter;
033import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.protocol.http.HttpProtocolModule;
034import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.protocol.tn3270.Tn3270MessageReconstructor;
035import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.protocol.tn3270.Tn3270PairingEngineAdapter;
036import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.protocol.tn3270.Tn3270ProtocolModule;
037import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.time.SystemClockAdapter;
038import java.nio.file.Path;
039import java.util.HashSet;
040import java.util.List;
041import java.util.Map;
042import java.util.Objects;
043import java.util.Set;
044import java.util.function.Supplier;
045
046/**
047 * Temporary composition root used while migrating to the new architecture. It currently exposes
048 * stubbed use cases and will be populated with real wiring in subsequent steps.
049 */
050public final class CompositionRoot {
051  private final Config config;
052  private final CaptureConfig captureConfig;
053
054  /**
055   * Creates a composition root with default capture configuration.
056   *
057   * @param config base configuration for enabled protocols and defaults
058   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
059   */
060  public CompositionRoot(Config config) {
061    this(config, CaptureConfig.defaults());
062  }
063
064  /**
065   * Creates a composition root with explicit capture configuration overrides.
066   *
067   * @param config base configuration for enabled protocols and defaults
068   * @param captureConfig capture-specific overrides
069   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
070   */
071  public CompositionRoot(Config config, CaptureConfig captureConfig) {
072    this.config = Objects.requireNonNull(config, "config");
073    this.captureConfig = Objects.requireNonNull(captureConfig, "captureConfig");
074  }
075
076  /**
077   * Provides available protocol modules (HTTP and TN3270).
078   *
079   * @return available protocol modules (HTTP and TN3270)
080   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
081   */
082  public List<ProtocolModule> protocolModules() {
083    return List.of(new HttpProtocolModule(), new Tn3270ProtocolModule());
084  }
085
086  /**
087   * Builds the protocol detector wired with the enabled modules.
088   *
089   * @return protocol detector wired with the enabled modules
090   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
091   */
092  public ProtocolDetector protocolDetector() {
093    return new DefaultProtocolDetector(protocolModules(), config.enabledProtocols());
094  }
095
096  /**
097   * Builds the segment capture use case using the configured ports.
098   *
099   * @return capture use case
100   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
101   */
102  public SegmentCaptureUseCase segmentCaptureUseCase() {
103    MetricsPort metricsPort = metrics();
104    return new SegmentCaptureUseCase(
105        newPacketSource(),
106        new FrameDecoderLibpcap(),
107        segmentPersistence(),
108        metricsPort);
109  }
110
111  /**
112   * Builds the live processing use case using the configured ports.
113   *
114   * @return live processing use case
115   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
116   */
117  public LiveProcessingUseCase liveProcessingUseCase() {
118    MetricsPort metricsPort = metrics();
119    ClockPort clockPort = clock();
120    LiveProcessingUseCase.PersistenceSettings persistenceSettings =
121        new LiveProcessingUseCase.PersistenceSettings(
122            captureConfig.persistenceWorkers(),
123            captureConfig.persistenceQueueCapacity(),
124            mapQueueType(captureConfig.persistenceQueueType()));
125    return new LiveProcessingUseCase(
126        newPacketSource(),
127        new FrameDecoderLibpcap(),
128        new ReorderingFlowAssembler(metricsPort, "live.flowAssembler"),
129        protocolDetector(),
130        reconstructorFactories(clockPort, metricsPort),
131        pairingFactories(),
132        messagePersistence(),
133        metricsPort,
134        config.enabledProtocols(),
135        persistenceSettings);
136  }
137
138  /**
139   * Builds the assemble use case for the provided configuration.
140   *
141   * @param assembleConfig assemble configuration
142   * @return assemble use case
143   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
144   */
145  public AssembleUseCase assembleUseCase(AssembleConfig assembleConfig) {
146    Objects.requireNonNull(assembleConfig, "assembleConfig");
147    MetricsPort metricsPort = metrics();
148    ClockPort clockPort = clock();
149    Set<ProtocolId> enabled = enabledProtocolsForAssemble(assembleConfig);
150    return new AssembleUseCase(
151        assembleConfig,
152        new ReorderingFlowAssembler(metricsPort, "assemble.flowAssembler"),
153        protocolDetector(),
154        reconstructorFactories(clockPort, metricsPort),
155        pairingFactories(),
156        messagePersistence(assembleConfig),
157        metricsPort,
158        enabled,
159        buildSegmentReaderFactory());
160  }
161
162  /**
163   * Supplies the metrics implementation used across use cases.
164   *
165   * @return metrics implementation used across use cases
166   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
167   */
168  public MetricsPort metrics() {
169    return new NoOpMetricsAdapter();
170  }
171
172  /**
173   * Supplies the clock implementation used for timestamping.
174   *
175   * @return clock implementation used for timestamping
176   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
177   */
178  public ClockPort clock() {
179    return new SystemClockAdapter();
180  }
181
182  private PacketSource newPacketSource() {
183    if (captureConfig.pcapFile() != null) {
184      return new PcapFilePacketSource(
185          captureConfig.pcapFile(), captureConfig.filter(), captureConfig.snaplen());
186    }
187    return new PcapPacketSource(
188        captureConfig.iface(),
189        captureConfig.snaplen(),
190        captureConfig.promiscuous(),
191        captureConfig.timeoutMillis(),
192        captureConfig.bufferBytes(),
193        captureConfig.immediate(),
194        captureConfig.filter());
195  }
196
197  private SegmentPersistencePort segmentPersistence() {
198    if (captureConfig.ioMode() == IoMode.KAFKA) {
199      return new SegmentKafkaSinkAdapter(
200          captureConfig.kafkaBootstrap(),
201          captureConfig.kafkaTopicSegments());
202    }
203    return new SegmentFileSinkAdapter(
204        captureConfig.outputDirectory(),
205        captureConfig.fileBase(),
206        captureConfig.rollMiB());
207  }
208
209  private PersistencePort messagePersistence() {
210    return buildFilePersistence(
211        captureConfig.httpOutputDirectory(),
212        captureConfig.tn3270OutputDirectory(),
213        true,
214        true);
215  }
216
217  private PersistencePort messagePersistence(AssembleConfig assembleConfig) {
218    if (assembleConfig.ioMode() == IoMode.KAFKA) {
219      String bootstrap = assembleConfig.kafkaBootstrap()
220          .orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalStateException("kafkaBootstrap required for assemble Kafka mode"));
221      return buildKafkaPersistence(
222          bootstrap,
223          assembleConfig.kafkaHttpPairsTopic(),
224          assembleConfig.kafkaTnPairsTopic(),
225          assembleConfig.httpEnabled(),
226          assembleConfig.tnEnabled());
227    }
228    return buildFilePersistence(
229        assembleConfig.effectiveHttpOut(),
230        assembleConfig.effectiveTnOut(),
231        assembleConfig.httpEnabled(),
232        assembleConfig.tnEnabled());
233  }
234
235  private AssembleUseCase.SegmentReaderFactory buildSegmentReaderFactory() {
236    AssembleUseCase.SegmentReaderFactory fileFactory = AssembleUseCase.segmentIoReaderFactory();
237    return cfg -> {
238      if (cfg.ioMode() == IoMode.KAFKA) {
239        String bootstrap = cfg.kafkaBootstrap()
240            .orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalStateException("kafkaBootstrap required for assemble Kafka mode"));
241        KafkaSegmentReader reader = new KafkaSegmentReader(bootstrap, cfg.kafkaSegmentsTopic());
242        return new KafkaSegmentRecordReaderAdapter(reader);
243      }
244      return fileFactory.open(cfg);
245    };
246  }
247
248  private LiveProcessingUseCase.QueueType mapQueueType(CaptureConfig.PersistenceQueueType type) {
249    CaptureConfig.PersistenceQueueType source = Objects.requireNonNullElse(type, CaptureConfig.PersistenceQueueType.ARRAY);
250    return switch (source) {
251      case ARRAY -> LiveProcessingUseCase.QueueType.ARRAY;
252      case LINKED -> LiveProcessingUseCase.QueueType.LINKED;
253    };
254  }
255  private Set<ProtocolId> enabledProtocolsForAssemble(AssembleConfig assembleConfig) {
256    Set<ProtocolId> enabled = new HashSet<>();
257    if (assembleConfig.httpEnabled()) {
258      enabled.add(ProtocolId.HTTP);
259    }
260    if (assembleConfig.tnEnabled()) {
261      enabled.add(ProtocolId.TN3270);
262    }
263    return enabled;
264  }
265
266  private PersistencePort buildFilePersistence(
267      Path httpDirectory,
268      Path tnDirectory,
269      boolean httpEnabled,
270      boolean tnEnabled) {
271    PersistencePort tail = new NoOpPersistenceAdapter();
272    if (tnEnabled) {
273      tail = new Tn3270SegmentSinkPersistenceAdapter(tnDirectory, tail);
274    }
275    if (httpEnabled) {
276      tail = new HttpSegmentSinkPersistenceAdapter(httpDirectory, tail);
277    }
278    return tail;
279  }
280
281  private PersistencePort buildKafkaPersistence(
282      String bootstrap,
283      String httpPairsTopic,
284      String tnPairsTopic,
285      boolean httpEnabled,
286      boolean tnEnabled) {
287    PersistencePort tail = new NoOpPersistenceAdapter();
288    if (tnEnabled) {
289      tail = new Tn3270KafkaPersistenceAdapter(bootstrap, tnPairsTopic, tail);
290    }
291    if (httpEnabled) {
292      tail = new HttpKafkaPersistenceAdapter(bootstrap, httpPairsTopic, tail);
293    }
294    return tail;
295  }
296
297  private Map<ProtocolId, Supplier<MessageReconstructor>> reconstructorFactories(
298      ClockPort clock, MetricsPort metrics) {
299    return Map.of(
300        ProtocolId.HTTP, () -> new HttpMessageReconstructor(clock, metrics),
301        ProtocolId.TN3270, () -> new Tn3270MessageReconstructor(clock, metrics));
302  }
303
304  private Map<ProtocolId, Supplier<PairingEngine>> pairingFactories() {
305    return Map.of(
306        ProtocolId.HTTP, HttpPairingEngineAdapter::new,
307        ProtocolId.TN3270, Tn3270PairingEngineAdapter::new);
308  }
309
310  /**
311   * Exposes the base configuration reference.
312   *
313   * @return base configuration reference
314   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
315   */
316  public Config config() {
317    return config;
318  }
319
320  /**
321   * Exposes the capture configuration reference.
322   *
323   * @return capture configuration reference
324   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
325   */
326  public CaptureConfig captureConfig() {
327    return captureConfig;
328  }
329}
330
331
332
